title: Product of the Week: Personalized Vinyl Record with Photo
description: Celebrate moments with the Personalized Vinyl Record—custom songs, photos, and timeless design for a thoughtful keepsake!
author: Anzah
excerpt: Create meaningful memories with the Personalized Vinyl Record with Photo. You can add a photo, customize the song, and play it with the scannable code!
text: Looking for a gift that’s as unique as the moments it celebrates? The Personalized Vinyl Record with Photo is more than just a decorative piece. It’s a beautiful blend of art, music, and sentimentality. Whether it’s for a wedding, anniversary, or simply to celebrate a shared love for music, this customized acrylic record is such a nice keepsake. This record display allows you to combine your favorite song, singer, and a cherished photo—so you’re creating a meaningful piece that encapsulates precious memories! The scannable song code adds an interactive element. You can instantly play your chosen track with your phone camera—perfect for reliving those special moments. The piece is crafted from high-quality acrylic and an elegant wood base. Its style is sophisticated and easily fits into any home decor style. Plus, its size options of 9 inches or 6.75 inches means you can choose the piece that fits your shelf or desk. This personalized vinyl record is a thoughtful gift for loved ones—from celebrating anniversaries to surprising a best friend with a wedding keepsake. It’s a heartwarming way to show the bond you share and the memories that make it special. Each record is handmade with love and carefully customized to your specifications. Order yours today at Etsy to make memories last a lifetime!
